Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.CharacterCards

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.CharacterCards.CharacterCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
DenyCardManager, StudentManager
public class CharacterCard extends Object implements StudentManager, DenyCardManager
Character card class (it can contain students and deny cards on it).

    setUsed()

  • Method Details

    • setUsed

      public void setUsed()
      When the card is used by the player its cost will increase by 1 and this method will set used to true for the rest of the game in order to prevent other increase of the cost when played the same card another time.

    • addStudent
